hero.description: Specialized in robust web solutions with PHP/Laravel, Node.js, and React. Passionate about problem-solving and developing scalable applications. Continuously learning and seeking new professional challenges.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Proactive Full-Stack Developer passionate about creating innovative solutions
about.description1: Proactive and delivery-oriented Junior Full-Stack Developer, specializing in creating robust and scalable web solutions. My tech stack includes PHP/Laravel, Node.js, React, and experience with SQL and NoSQL databases.
about.description2: My differential value lies in my proactivity and unwavering commitment to learning and improving, both in teams and independently. This mindset allows me to quickly assimilate new technologies and apply a methodical approach to problem-solving.
about.description3: Currently in my final year of the Higher Technical Degree in Software Analysis and Development, actively seeking my first professional opportunity to apply my knowledge, grow within a Systems team, and contribute to the development of quality solutions.

experiences.title: IT Maintenance Technician
experiences.description: Diagnosis and repair of hardware and software, preventive maintenance, remote/on-site technical support, OS installation (Windows/Linux), and basic LAN network configuration.

experiences.title: Data Analysis
experiences.description: Experience in data analysis and visualization with Power BI and Excel, optimizing information organization for data-driven decision making.

experiences.title: Full-Stack Development
experiences.description: Experience in development with PHP/Laravel, Node.js, React, and database management with SQL (MySQL) and NoSQL (MongoDB).

experiences.title: Technical Skills
experiences.description: Backend: Node.js, PHP/Laravel. Frontend: React, JavaScript, TypeScript. Databases: MySQL, MongoDB. Tools: Git, GitHub, Docker.
